author: daijy
msg: PIG-3426: Add support for removing s3 files

author: prestonc
msg: Updated VXQuery to use the DistributedResult operator. The operator allows for multiple node controllers to be used during execution. The CLI will now work with a cluster of node controllers. In addition to cluster support, the CLI has been modified to run multiple node controllers on a local system for testing purposes. A command line option -local-node-controllers can specify the number of nodes and ${nodeId} can be added to the collection function to distinguish between different data partitions.
